clinical_study.brief_title: Ten Years Results of a Score System to Address Adjuvant Therapies After Breast Conserving Surgery for Ductal Carcinoma in Situ of the Breast
clinical_study.official_title: Ten Years Results of a Score System to Address Adjuvant Therapies After Breast Conserving Surgery for Ductal Carcinoma in Situ of the Breast.

lead_sponsor.agency: Fondazione IRCCS Istituto Nazionale dei Tumori, Milano

clinical_study.source: Fondazione IRCCS Istituto Nazionale dei Tumori, Milano

brief_summary.textblock:
By this non-randomized prospective study, it's evaluated the outcome of patients underwent BCS for DCIS at whom an established score system to address adjuvant therapies have been prospectively applied, according to the wideness of free margins.
Between March 2000 and April 2006, 224 patients were enrolled and followed within the study.

secondary_outcome.description: the side effects of radiotherapy may outweigh the reduction in the risk of IBTR
